name: The Rescue Mission
description: A quick linear rescue: Cinematic intro → Social negotiation → Tactical combat

encounters.title: The Kidnapping
encounters.description: A trusted ally has been taken. The kidnappers left a cryptic message.

encounters.title: Gathering Intel
encounters.description: Question witnesses, gather clues, and learn the kidnappers' location.

encounters.title: The Rescue
encounters.description: Storm the hideout and free the captive before it's too late.

name: The Heist
description: Classic heist structure: Planning → Infiltration → Complications → Escape

encounters.title: The Job Offer
encounters.description: A mysterious patron offers a lucrative but dangerous job.

encounters.title: Assemble the Crew
encounters.description: Recruit specialists and gather the tools needed for the job.

encounters.title: Case the Joint
encounters.description: Scout the target location, identify guards, cameras, and weak points.

encounters.title: The Infiltration
encounters.description: Sneak past security systems and reach the vault undetected.

encounters.title: Guards Alerted!
encounters.description: Something went wrong. Fight through security forces.

encounters.title: The Escape
encounters.description: Get away with the prize before reinforcements arrive.

name: The Mystery
description: Investigation and deduction: Crime scene → Witness interviews → Clue discovery → Confrontation

encounters.title: The Crime
encounters.description: A body is discovered under mysterious circumstances.

encounters.title: Examine the Scene
encounters.description: Search for physical evidence, examine the body, document everything.

encounters.title: Question Witnesses
encounters.description: Interview bystanders, suspects, and anyone with information.

encounters.title: Follow the Trail
encounters.description: Track down leads, search secondary locations, gather more evidence.

encounters.title: Connect the Dots
encounters.description: Confront suspects with evidence and narrow down the culprit.

encounters.title: Apprehend the Culprit
encounters.description: The killer makes a desperate stand when cornered.

encounters.title: The Revelation
encounters.description: The truth is revealed and justice is served.

name: The Hero's Journey
description: Epic quest structure: Call to adventure → Trials → Ordeal → Return

encounters.title: Ordinary World
encounters.description: Life is peaceful but something is about to change everything.

encounters.title: Call to Adventure
encounters.description: A messenger arrives with news of a great quest.

encounters.title: Crossing the Threshold
encounters.description: Leave the familiar world behind and enter the realm of adventure.

encounters.title: Tests and Allies
encounters.description: Explore strange lands, prove your worth, and find companions.

encounters.title: Guardian Battle
encounters.description: Face the guardian that protects the path forward.

encounters.title: Meeting the Mentor
encounters.description: A wise figure shares crucial knowledge and guidance.

encounters.title: Approach to the Cave
encounters.description: Navigate the treacherous approach to the final challenge.

encounters.title: The Ordeal
encounters.description: Face the greatest challenge and overcome impossible odds.

encounters.title: Seizing the Reward
encounters.description: Claim the prize: treasure, knowledge, or power.

encounters.title: The Road Back
encounters.description: Escape with the prize as enemies pursue.

encounters.title: Return with Wisdom
encounters.description: Return home transformed, bearing gifts for your people.

name: The Siege
description: Defend against waves: Preparation → Multiple tactical encounters → Final stand

encounters.title: Enemy Approaches
encounters.description: Scouts report a massive army marching toward the fortress.

encounters.title: Rally the Defenders
encounters.description: Inspire the garrison, assign positions, and prepare for battle.

encounters.title: Fortify Defenses
encounters.description: Identify weak points, reinforce walls, set traps and ambushes.

encounters.title: First Wave
encounters.description: The enemy tests the defenses with an initial assault.

encounters.title: Sabotage Mission
encounters.description: Sneak out and sabotage enemy siege equipment.

encounters.title: Second Wave
encounters.description: A more coordinated assault with siege towers and rams.

encounters.title: Reinforcements Arrive
encounters.description: Allied forces appear on the horizon just when hope seems lost.

encounters.title: Final Assault
encounters.description: The enemy commits everything in a desperate final push.

encounters.title: Victory or Defeat
encounters.description: The siege ends and the survivors count the cost.

name: Tower Takeover
description: Inspired by Die Hard: Hostage situation in high-rise building

encounters.title: The Party Crashers
encounters.description: Armed intruders seize control during a grand celebration.

encounters.title: Slip Away Unnoticed
encounters.description: Evade capture and find a hiding spot to plan your next move.

encounters.title: Scout the Building
encounters.description: Learn the layout, find weapons, and identify the intruders' plan.

encounters.title: First Contact
encounters.description: Take down isolated guards and acquire better equipment.

encounters.title: Call for Help
encounters.description: Make contact with authorities and warn them of the true threat.

encounters.title: Sabotage Operations
encounters.description: Disrupt the intruders' plan by destroying key equipment.

encounters.title: Rooftop Showdown
encounters.description: Face the leader and their elite guards in a desperate final battle.

encounters.title: Aftermath
encounters.description: Survivors are freed and the building is secured.

name: Just Another Snake Cult
description: Inspired by Conan: Ancient cult, dark sorcery, and climactic tower ascent

encounters.title: The Enslaved
encounters.description: A mysterious cult has been kidnapping villagers for dark rituals.

encounters.title: Infiltrate the Cult
encounters.description: Pose as initiates to gain access to the inner sanctum.

encounters.title: Uncover the Plot
encounters.description: Learn of the ancient evil they seek to awaken.

encounters.title: Dungeon Guards
encounters.description: Fight through cultists to reach the prisoners.

encounters.title: Ascend the Tower
encounters.description: Climb the serpent tower while avoiding traps and sentries.

encounters.title: The High Priest
encounters.description: Confront the cult leader and their summoned serpent god.

encounters.title: The Temple Falls
encounters.description: The dark temple crumbles as the evil is vanquished.

name: The Prison Break
description: Inspired by Shawshank/Alcatraz: Elaborate escape from maximum security

encounters.title: Wrongfully Convicted
encounters.description: Sentenced to an inescapable fortress prison for a crime you didn't commit.

encounters.title: Earn Trust
encounters.description: Navigate prison politics and recruit allies for the escape.

encounters.title: Study the Routine
encounters.description: Learn guard patterns, identify weaknesses, and gather intelligence.

encounters.title: The Tunnel
encounters.description: Secretly dig an escape route over weeks, avoiding discovery.

encounters.title: The Riot
encounters.description: Stage a distraction while the escape team makes their move.

encounters.title: The Escape
encounters.description: Race through tunnels and over walls before the alarm is raised.

encounters.title: Freedom
encounters.description: Finally free, but with guards still searching everywhere.
